Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Deep Agent + Linkup API Intelligence Layer for funding detection

## Enrichment Pipeline
- Add fundingEvents and enrichmentJobs tables to schema
- Implement pattern-based funding detection from feed items
- Add cross-source verification with confidence scoring
- Create entity promotion pipeline for banker-grade dossiers

## New Tools & Actions
- linkupFetch: Linkup /fetch API with auto-escalation for thin content
- fundingDetection: Pattern matching for funding announcements
- fundingVerification: Multi-source corroboration/contradiction detection
- entityPromotion: Promote funding events to first-class entities

## Agent Integration
- Register getTodaysFundingEvents, searchFundingEvents, detectFundingFromFeeds
- Add Funding Detection Workflow to agent instructions
- Enable natural language queries like "who raised money today?"

## Digest Enhancement
- Add funding sections to daily morning brief
- Format by round type (Seed, Series A, etc.)
- Include verification status and source count

Tested with Vaccinex $60M funding:
- 85% confidence (verified)
- 4 corroborating sources found
- Entity promotion working

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
